name: MazeMe
description:
ENDLESS HOURS OF FUN WITH **YOUR** MAZES.

MazeMe can make a maze out of ANY image you want as long as it has a white background.
DOWNLOAD your maze from the internet or take a PHOTO of it from a magazine an let maze it try to … well, Maze it!!!
Choose among 16 embedded mazes or make your own maze image and use any of your kid’s favorite heroes. Maze it can import the image and immediately play it.
Download ready made maze images and put your pictures on them to make your kids love them.

Try to reach to the end by traveling the minimum distance with as less taps as possible.

FEATURES

-16 Embedded mazes
-support for unlimited maze images made by you. Import files using iTunes or use theembedded (Photo to Maze) functionality for playing mazes you found on magazines just by taking a photo of them.
-Distance and tap counter for serious competitions
